Class LevelLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • LevelLoader
  • public class LevelLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to save and load levels saved in files.
    Version:
    3/24/2022
    Author:
    Ted McLeod

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String ROOT
      The root directory of the project this LevelLoader is in

      • LevelLoader

        public LevelLoader​(greenfoot.World world,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Class<? extends greenfoot.Actor>> typeMap)
        Constructor that creates a LevelLoader that can load levels in the given world with the given typeMap definining which symbols represent which classes
        Parameters:
        world - the world this loader will load a level in
        typeMap - a map defining each symbol and the class associated with the symbol

        Constructor that creates a LevelLoader that can load levels in the given world.

        world - the world this loader will load a level in

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Loads the level at the given file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to load

      • loadLevel

        public void loadLevel​(java.lang.String filePath,
                      int offX,
                      int offY)
        Loads the level at the given file path with the given offsets.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to load
        offX - all actor locations are offset by this amount horizontally
        offY - all actor locations are offset by this amount vertically

      • saveLevel

        public void saveLevel​(java.lang.String filePath)
        Saves the state of all the objects in the world that are of a class in the type map in the file at the given file path.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to save the level in

      • saveLevel

        public void saveLevel​(java.lang.String filePath,
                      int width,
                      int height)
        Saves the state of all the objects in the world that are of a class in the type map in the file at the given file path and records the desired world width and height.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path to the file to save the level in
        width - the world width
        height - the world height

      • promptForSavePath

        public static java.lang.String promptForSavePath()
        Prompts the user to choose a file to save to and returns the path to the file chosen. If the user does not choose a file (i.e. presses cancel), it returns null.
        Returns:
        the path to the file chosen or null if no file chosen.

      • promptForLoadPath

        public static java.lang.String promptForLoadPath()
        Prompts the user to choose a file to load and returns the path to the file chosen. If the user does not choose a file (i.e. presses cancel), it returns null.
        Returns:
        the path to the file chosen or null if no file chosen.

        Returns the dimensions of the world in the file at the given path

        the dimensions of the world in the file at the given path

      • isLevelJustLoaded

        public boolean isLevelJustLoaded()
        Returns true the first time it is called after a level has been loaded and then returns false after that.
        Returns:
        true if this is the first time this method is being called after loading a level and false otherwise
